example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM عالم) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM مصمم) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مكافحة) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MP اولئك)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الدؤوبين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN زرع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرعب) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الموت))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN خضم) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: to sow terror and death among us

example.arg: على زرع الرعب الموت في خضمنا
